Posts.Content: blacklump wrote: A few weeks back I saw this lump between my shoulder and the left breast. Observations: has a brown discoloration over it, like when you get a pimple and the pimple heals but the brown scar remains for some time. It feels around half a cm. moves with the skin a bit tender breasts have no lump Before I head out to my doctor, can someone please confirm: IF A SWOLLEN LYMPH NODE HAS DISCOLORATION ON TOP OF IT OR NOT ? Or if the skin above it remains normal colored ? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lymph node lump is scaring me, please help!! blacklump djmammo
